context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh could do is to
generation: call a taxi, Uber, or any other ride service
call a taxi, Uber or Lyft to come pick him up and get him to the airport in time
call a taxi or a rideshare service like Uber or Lyft to get him to the airport on time
call for a taxi, Uber, or any rideshare service to pick him up and take him to the airport
call a taxi, an Uber, or any other ride-service
call a taxi or an Uber to take him to the airport
call for a taxi or an Uber
call roadside assistance or a tow truck service to get his car to a garage, and then call a taxi, a ride share service, or a friend to take him the rest of the way to the airport
call a taxi or a rideshare service like Uber or Lyft to take him to the airport
call a taxi or use a ride-sharing app like Uber or Lyft to get to the airport in time

context_4.vignette: Mary is about to go to her final class of the day when she remebers that there is a homework assignment that is due. Mary's mom accidentally took her homework assignment out of her backpack when she was making room for her lunch. Now Mary has nothing to turn in for credit.
context_4.prompt: One thing that Mary could do is to
generation: contact her mom and ask if she could bring the assignment to school before her class begins
explain her situation to her teacher and ask if she could bring it the next day or send a picture or scanned copy of her homework assignment via email
email her teacher explaining her situation and ask for an extension or permission to turn in the homework assignment the following day
explain the situation to her teacher and ask for an extension to submit the homework assignment
call or text her mom to bring the assignment to school as soon as possible
explain what happened to her teacher and ask for an extension to submit the assignment
contact her mom immediately, asking her to bring the assignment to school if possible
explain the situation honestly to her teacher, providing as much detail and evidence as she can to show that she really did complete the assignment
immediately call or message her mom to bring the homework to school if possible
explain her situation to her teacher, apologize for the mishap, and ask for permission to turn in the homework assignment the next day

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad could do is to
generation: start rationing the food and water supplies they have left
build a makeshift shelter using branches and leaves to protect them from the harsh weather conditions
try and get a signal on his cell phone, if he has service
build a shelter to provide some warmth and protection from the elements
construct a shelter to protect himself and friends from the cold
start a fire to keep warm and cook any food they can find
start a fire for warmth and to attract the attention of any potential rescue crews
gather his group and ration out their remaining food and water
start creating signals that could be seen or heard by the rescue crew
create a survival plan
